thread.title: WATCH: Kevin Owens Uses The Stunner On Roman Reigns
thread.title_full: WATCH: Kevin Owens Uses The Stunner On Roman Reigns

author: Brandon Gnetz
title: WATCH: Kevin Owens Uses The Stunner On Roman Reigns
text:
WATCH: Kevin Owens Uses The Stunner On Roman Reigns Brandon Gnetz â€” WWE Universe (@WWEUniverse) January 30, 2017 
The Stunner would not be enough to put Roman Reigns away as he was able to kick out, but thanks to Braun Strowman's interference, Owens was able to hang onto his Universal Championship. 
Would you like to see more wrestlers from the current era using Stone Cold's finisher more often or should it be kept sacred? 
Listen to Comicbook.com's interview with inaugural Royal Rumble winner, Hacksaw Jim Duggan, on the Over The Ropes Podcast.
